website_summaries.verdict: One of the most trusted hair curlers available for purchase, this reliable product creates luxurious curls.
pros: Comes with 20 rollers, though different sizes are available for purchase
Safer for hair than a hot curling iron
Machine provides compartments for each roller
cons: Users with thick hair may have trouble keeping the curl in all day when using this product

website_summaries.verdict: Costly yet efficient, this gem delivers long-lasting style. The best hot roller set available.
cons: Metal butterfly clips are not suited to all hair types

customer_reviews.title: Uneven heat and No curls.
customer_reviews.text: I love BaByliss tools, I've used them for years, but these rollers were a disappointment. I tried to use these three times, and the only thing consistent was their faults. I let them heat up while I showered, which is plenty of time. Half of the rollers were barely warm, and a few were too hot to touch. I left them in until they were all cool to the touch, and they still did not curl my hair. I have a lot of layers and my hair is not heavy, so this should have worked. Still, my hair was barely wavy. (Pics included)
customer_reviews.author: Kylie Joe

customer_reviews.title: Horrible customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited using these curlers for the first 2 times. Then on the third time, the product would not work. I called the customer service number and it is the company policy that the consumer must pay the shipping to return this product to the service center, where it will be checked out, and then a new set would be sent if necessary. Again, this was the THIRD use!
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: Finally a set with enough rollers for a head of long, thick hair!
customer_reviews.text: Love these hot rollers! I have a lot of long hair and can never find a hot roller set with enough rollers for my entire head. Heats up quickly, plenty of rollers in different sizes. Quick and easy to way to style your hair on a busy day.
customer_reviews.author: KMM

customer_reviews.title: not easy to make it curly
customer_reviews.text: I have very heavy and specific hair, not easy to make it curly. so I tried different kind of items to make my hair natural curly. finally I found it, amazing amazing product. using it last 5 years. every day new and fresh look. do not burns and makes hair shiny. curly stays longer then any hair stylist did for me. it saved me a lot of time. gets hot in 15 min. while i do my make up dressed up my hair is done without loosing time. highly recommended. tips: your curly stays longer if u wait while it get cold and take it out after.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Babyliss Pro Nano Rollers
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed with this highly rated hot rollers. They do not get hot enough to curl the hair and I have natural waves. I used all of the large sizes on my long hair and left in for 30 minutes per the instructions. My hair had nice, loose curls that I finger fluffed only but they were gone in less than 10 minutes even though my hairs was completely cooled when the rollers came out. These are pricey and I returned them. I am still waitingon my refund from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Drmd

customer_reviews.title: Good hot rollers
customer_reviews.text: This company seems to be the only company making 2" hot rollers? It's a convenient traveling size. It would fit easily in a small rolling suitcase. It heats up quickly but the red dot, which came on initially, no longer functions. 5 rollers suits me. I don't do my whole head, just the top for volume. The downside are these clips. While there is a handy spot for storing the clips inside the hairsetter, these clips must be used top down instead of bottom up. They don't hold the rollers bottom up and the rollers fall down. The clips have to be pushed on top down in order to hold the roller.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Melted on second use...
customer_reviews.text: I’m a huge fan of hot rollers and these are THE WORST. They smell funny, they j evenly heat. One will burn your hand when you remove it and the end ones aren’t even hot. Meanwhile, the second time I used them, it melted. Total fire hazard. So disappointed. Stay away or you will end up burning down your house if you armet careful.
customer_reviews.author: SB1125

customer_reviews.title: Smelled like burning plastic
customer_reviews.text: I JUST got these rollers in the mail and was super excited to use them! They heated up fine, but smelled strongly of burning plastic. They did a fine job of curling my hair, but I'm too nervous to keep them, especially with the other reviews of melting rollers. I don't want to risk a fire.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Leone

customer_reviews.title: I really like this set!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many heated roller sets and the biggest issue has been that the curlers are too small. I wanted the rollers to all be the larger size. This set has been the best for giving the amount of curl I want. In addition it heats up quickly and the case has a rim which helps when you are wrapping the cord to put away. I would have given 5 stars, but the extra larger rollers are too large for the shorter hair on top of my head. A few rollers that are a little smaller (1/2 “ smaller in sz ) would be nice for my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I had to change my rating from five stars to one. It really shouldn't have any. These were amazing until one day the front row stopped working, back row got extremely hot, smoked and one roller melted. Scary!
customer_reviews.author: Bridge

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: I returned the BaByliss PRO Nano Titanium Professional Hot Rollers, due to the fact the hinge in the back arrived broken; therefore, the top did not fit securely. I could have opted for a replacement for this item; however, if the plastic hinge could break that easily in transit, I know it would break with normal use. This product did not meet my expectations. For the price, I would expect a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Grace

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in less than two months
customer_reviews.text: Susan Daniel writing: This set worked great at first, but has stopped working in less than two months. It appears that the rollers are not heating up enough. Do I have recourse at this point? I can't recommend this set because of my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Josiah Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Too hot to handle and too hot on my head
customer_reviews.text: I bought BaBylissPRO BABNTCHV21 Nano Titanium Roller Hairsetter, 20pc Set several months ago. I would have return this product, but time ran out because I am letting my hair grow. Today it's long enough for hot rollers. The hair rollers were too hot to handle, so I used rubber gloves. Got a couple in, and then they were too hot for my scalp. There is no heat regulator on the rollers, so I could not modulate the heat. This product got good reviews, so that is why I bought it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne C. Rellahan

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 years
customer_reviews.text: I tried this brand after years of using CONAIR brand jumbo rollers. I after two years the felt on the jumbo rollers had worn off and I actually blistered my finger by accidentally touching the feltless area, that’s how I realized the rollers had bald spots. No telling what kind of damage it did to my hair before I realized it. This brand and the CONAIR both have issues with the top cracking, I think the heat makes the plastic brittle. I’m going back to CONAIR, I’ve use that brand for years and never once had the felt wear away.
customer_reviews.author: DoveSoup

customer_reviews.title: Don't work on my hair
customer_reviews.text: I waited a while to write this review because I thought maybe my hair being damaged needed to try them when my hair was less damaged. I have tried these a few times. They just don't work. I have used these kinds of rollers in the past and they worked great. These don't I wish I had returned them. They will go to donation pile. I find that they don't hold the curl and that they don't get rid of frizz. Which, means that it is not worth it to use. I have very thick wavy frizzy hair (latina) would not recommend for that type of hair.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Jerez

customer_reviews.title: My Mistake to try for higher quality rollers, these r NOT it!!
customer_reviews.text: rollers do not get hot enough, do no good at all. would return but had purchased the 5 set because i travel, grabbed right of box, packed for trip & hit airport! when returned home box had been trashed when family cleaned or I would certainly return. Very overpriced for rollers, expected more due to high ratings.Inexpensive Conair do much better. DO NOT GET HOT , AT BEST LUKE WARM. FAIL
customer_reviews.author: lantana077

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have very thin, flat hair, and had no issues using these for that “Marilyn” look. It comes with both clips and pins. I let them set for 10 minutes, then blasted them with the hair dryer, and let them set for 20 more minutes. Love how my hair came out!
customer_reviews.author: Raygan Keller

customer_reviews.title: Melted Rollers
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this. The rollers overheat and melt and they will burn your hand or your hair will get stuck in the melted plastic. The back row stops working as well. Called the company and they will not acknowledge nor compensate for the faulty product. I too loved this product except after it fell apart. Not worth spending the $60. Better to buy a cheaper one that actually lasts.
customer_reviews.author: SSA

customer_reviews.title: Hot Rollers not hot
customer_reviews.text: They do not heat up enough, seems like only half are working.
customer_reviews.author: Fredda Briscoe Morgan

customer_reviews.title: and it helped me keep my hair nice with minimal effort
customer_reviews.text: took this with my abroad for 5 weeks, and it helped me keep my hair nice with minimal effort, since we were sightseeing and did not have time to spend on my hair. just set them in, i have a lot of hair, so i did one half, did other things, then put the rollers back to heat again, did other things, and then put them on the other half. i already have the full set at home (which covers all my hair in one go) so I already knew I liked this product, so happy this travel size was available, what a time saver!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and my only complaint is that I would have liked more clips with the rollers
customer_reviews.text: They heat up fast, and my only complaint is that I would have liked more clips with the rollers. Even though they are titanium, I think I still got split ends after using them too often, but I am not sure if it was due to these rollers, or the hair dryer I use. Overall, I really do like them. Nice curls in my straight hair.
customer_reviews.author: sunshine

customer_reviews.title: The plastic top breaks very easily however it’s a great product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this hot roller the only problem is the plastic top breaks very very easily which I hope the manufacturer would do something about that
customer_reviews.author: Shirin

customer_reviews.title: Makes loose waves-not necessarily curls..
customer_reviews.text: Used for the first time last night. This set came with the metal u shaped clips and claw clips, I like the claw clips! I have waist length hair-and either need to get it cut shorter or buy a different set of rollers. They are Jumbo, so they don’t really “curl”, more like loose wave. I think they’ll work better when my hair is shorter, but for now I’ll just put them away. It is a very nice set for the right hair length. Did heat up quickly, under five minutes. Easy to remove and put back.
customer_reviews.author: Georgina

customer_reviews.title: Rollers work well but case falls apart easily
customer_reviews.text: The rollers work well but the case easily cracks & the lid is already in pieces with minimal use and could become a safety issue. This is my 2nd Babybliss pro hair setter because the previous one also fell apart. Unfortunately this will be my last Babybliss hair setter, need to find a brand that has a more durable case.
customer_reviews.author: Marian

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I used hot rollers back in the 80's now back to using them. Much improved, non damaging barrel, love the clips, the right size roller for my hair, and the right amount. I have fine hair and need a help with a little volume. Definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: MDPinto

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Works well and the clips are way better than the old wire clips. Heats up pretty quick and the curlers are not too hot to handle. I like the big set for choices on how to style. If you have thin or hard to curl hair you may need a setting spray. My hair doesnt hold curl well, but these worked on my hair without setting spray.
customer_reviews.author: Jala

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, but didn't curl my hair
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this so much - it is nice and small, easy to use, feels great, doesn't burn your ears...BUT it didn't really curl my hair. It gave me a wave for a minute and then it fell flat. I tried it twice, once after just drying my hair, and again the next day with completely dry hair. Both times it didn't hold the curl. I have fine, thin hair, so maybe that's why, but unfortunately this product didn't work for me and I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Engineering Student

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality - Lid CRACKS
customer_reviews.text: I came back and found this item in my orders to write a review, as the plastic lid has cracked from the heat. The unit has never been dropped the lid just cracked from the heat and now it’s not usable. At a minimum, the company should enable us to buy replacement lids if they’re going to be of such poor quality. It would be helpful if the lid was made from the same plastic as the body of the unit, which seems more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: and this is the best product that I have found to give me the ...
customer_reviews.text: I am "challenged" when it comes to hair, and this is the best product that I have found to give me the style that I would expect in a salon. My hair is almost shoulder length and it takes about 10 minutes for me to "roll" it. I use the butterfly clips and leave them in for a few minutes. After I take the rollers out, it requires very little combing. I just do a little back combing on top for height. It works best after I wash and dry my hair, but I am experimenting with using the Babyliss on hair without shampooing. A hair net at night helps.
customer_reviews.author: Frederica Shockley

customer_reviews.title: Love love ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this! Super easy to use! My favorite is that it comes with clips and metal pins. I probably will never use the metal myself but it’s nice to have options. I washed my hair then I dried with root spray and styling gel. After it was dry I just sprayed with guy tang’s thermal spray, rolled/left on for 35 minutes, and hot it hard with redken 28 control addict hairspray. I am a hairstylist but this is staying home🥰❤️❤️🙌🏻
customer_reviews.author: Lindz479

customer_reviews.title: A piece fell off a roller in less than a month.
customer_reviews.text: I was really loving these rollers and even bought a second set because I wanted a backup. Also, I have a lot of hair and having 16 rollers works better than just 12 on days I want my hair to have a lot of volume. Today I went to set my hair and the plastic on one of the rollers in my backup set looked odd. I touched it and a piece FELL OFF. I’ve had this less than a month and don’t even use these all the time like I do the first set I got in December.
customer_reviews.author: J. Daly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size rollers
customer_reviews.text: These are from a great brand and you get 12 larger size rollers that make beautiful bouncy waves/ curls. They heat up quickly. They are a bit hot to touch but not too bad. They have the bobby pin style clips as well as the clamshell style clips. They leave your hair so smooth and shiny. Beautiful if you are tired of the damage from curling irons.
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Sad face.
customer_reviews.text: So this morning, I tried my new set of Conair that arrived yesterday. They did not work. They were not hot enough. So I returned them. At the same time, ordering these. Little did I know that it is the same company! Although it says titanium, it’s the same one as the porcelain Conair. They do not heat enough. Sadly, I will be going to the old fashion curling set. What’s sad, is that I own a flat iron and a curling iron from BaByliss. They produce a tremendous amount of heat! This does not compare to the other products I own.
customer_reviews.author: Shanali Davila

customer_reviews.title: Velvet rollers for gentle waves
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect ! Other hot rollers and wands will scorch the skin off your fingers and fry your hair to a crisp. Babyliss rollers have a velvety surface that grabs hair really well, curls well --- and never burns. Rollers give soft waves, not tight curls. The jumbo size rollers are excellent for adding lift.
customer_reviews.author: Pace Merriman

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: This product is supposed to work at all voltages. But the only way to use it with 240v is to slide a tiny button on the bottom from one side to the other. Not well marked. No warning. No breaker to protect it. One time plugged in without the switch slid from one side to the other and the product is useless. I know. User error. But no decent instructions. Most dual voltage appliances manage the switch over on their own.
customer_reviews.author: Pritchett

customer_reviews.title: Very good product and a keeper
customer_reviews.text: One thing I have to say is that I have EXTREMELY straight hair and live in an EXTREMELY high humid part of the country. These curlers heat up wonderfully and are designed with a felt that won't cause much heat injury to the hair. My hair turns out beautifully but the style does not last at all. I am still keeping the curlers because at least they do give my hair some body. Otherwise, my hair would just hang there flat, frizzy, and straight without any fullness and I would look like a witch or a scarecrow.
customer_reviews.author: Analexa

customer_reviews.title: Defective!
customer_reviews.text: First time using this set and they melted!! Two of the five rollers just melted apart! I went to grab one and the top came off and all this oozey hot white stuff came out of the roller! Looked inside the case and the oozey stuff had come out of the bottoms of the rollers! Crazy!! I’ve never seen anything like it! And they’re not inexpensive!! Wouldn’t give any stars!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are plastic without any clay or wax. They don't stay hot.
customer_reviews.text: I like the number and size of the rollers, but they are just not substantial enough to hold heat for any length of time. I have difficult to curl hair. I need really hot curlers. These just don't do it. Cheap plastic doesn't hold heat for more than 5 minutes. I'm very disappointed that I spent a small fortune on these!
customer_reviews.author: Ginny Horton

customer_reviews.title: Was not able to hold curl in my fine medium length hair
customer_reviews.text: Nice rollers but didn't work for my fine hair. I rolled my hair and left the curlers in until they were very cool and then gently unrolled each and sprayed hair by sections trying to keep the curl. My hair looked pretty good after but the curls started falling out about 30 mins after unrolling. I ended up with just a little more body than usual. Still pretty hair but not curled so I decided to return them. The curlers did heat up very quickly (3 mins) and were easy on my hair and fingers. I wish they would've worked for my fine hair. I'm still looking for a solution to quickly and gently set curls in my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not curl thick hair. But still like the brand
customer_reviews.text: I have this same brand of straight iron and love it. However I have think hair and it did not curl my hair at all and left the pieces straight after releasing the hold from the clip not 2-3 later. I now use my straight iron to curl my hair and it works very well and stays in all day. The straight iron if this brand is better than CHI.
customer_reviews.author: Stevi

customer_reviews.title: DON'T HEAT UP ENOUGH
customer_reviews.text: These rollers are a good size but they don't get hot enough to really curl hair. I have multiple sets by various brands but these are the worst.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Buxton

customer_reviews.title: Fast, easy and great results.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this hairsetter. I wore out the first one after about 15 years at home and traveling (it still worked, but the plastic case broke). I like this set for the compact size, the flocked curler surfaces that don't burn your fingers or your hair, and the fast heat-up. I looked at other sets, but didn't see anything I liked as well as this one. My hair is shoulder-length, straight and fine, and this set adds volume and turns the ends under.
customer_reviews.author: Debra T., Fla.

customer_reviews.title: Clips are cheap and mine never heated up properly
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I am using the clips wrong or what however I could not get the flimsy clips to work nor did the curlers get super hot even though it heated up for an hour. I left them in my hair for an hour and my hair just fell flat after they were taken out. Super disappointed as it would be nice to find a decent set of curlers and clips.
customer_reviews.author: Madison B

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't get it if you have thick hair.
customer_reviews.text: When I was looking to buy new hot rollers, I read the reviews for this product. The reviews were about 65% good. One of the reviews said that the curls didn't hold. Nevertheless, because of the other reviews, I bought these rollers. I found out immediately that the 1 bad review what correct. The curls don't last very long. I've had to curl my hair everyday with this product. I didn't have to do that with my other hot rollers, which I had for 20 years!! I should have paid attention to that review! For the prices, I was expecting a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My daughter has very fine hair and this product helps her achieve the curls ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has very fine hair and this product helps her achieve the curls she wants in conjunction with the dryer I bought her. She is very happy with the product . She is 12 and it does nto burn her hair. We do not plug it in, we just put the setting lotion, wait ten minutes then put her under the dryer I bought on here for 20 minutes and the most beautiful curls are created.
customer_reviews.author: S07D7

customer_reviews.title: Good curlers
customer_reviews.text: I use these daily and have used them for months. I don't like that they have so many larger curlers and not enough small curlers. Also,these curlers are split down the middle and sometimes they are difficult to place the pin to keep them in place. Heat is good and it has an on / button. Still, I think I will try a different set next time.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary E.

customer_reviews.title: The hot curlers I remember from my youth
customer_reviews.text: These were recommended by a blogger and I have to say, they are everything good I remember about the hot rollers of my teen years (in the 90s). The key is to completely let them cool before removing for the best curl longevity....and using good hair product before you put them in. Unfortunately, I have forgotten how to use them with ease and they are a bit of challenge. I'm sure with practice it will get easier.
customer_reviews.author: AK1995

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Did not work on wavy, thick, long hair. My hair easily holds curl from a curling iron, so I assumed these would work well. However, the rollers did not do anything.
customer_reviews.author: Br & Ca

customer_reviews.title: My wife liked these
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping, that by using these, my wife would look like 1970’s icon Farah Fawcett. Not quite, she looked more like 1980’s boxing promoter, Don King. Still love her though....most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Sad Hubby

customer_reviews.title: Not for curls
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t care for them unless you only want waves not curls.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!  Quality is as good as my Babyliss straightener!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, these really work and fast! I have been using a Babyliss straightener for many years and have always felt no other brand compared. I decided to try these curlers as my old ones just didn't do much and were hard to use. These not only heat up fast, but they are so soft and never stick to my hair. And, HELLO, where have these clips been in my lifetime? They are so easy and the curlers never slip while held by them on my head. Love these and guess I'll be having curly hair styles for a while! ;)
customer_reviews.author: DFish

customer_reviews.title: Gets very hot
customer_reviews.text: The rollers get too hot and do not stay in very well. I stick kleenex under the roller to keep from burning my scaple. I hope to find a way to use them. Electric curlers need a heat setting like curling irons. I probaly should return it, and just have not got around to it yet. I had one before and it was the opposite, it did not get very hot, and I still have it. Too expensive when it does not work well, but I like the size of curlers.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: These don't curl
customer_reviews.text: I have tried to use the ten large rollers over and over again with different products and these just do not curl my hair. I have thin, fine, hair past my shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Dre

customer_reviews.title: Love this concept, running into problems
customer_reviews.text: After 1 hour these curlers are only warm. Really bummed! Update, I keep trying, but yesterday the heat indicating roller broke. The plastic white came off and will not stay. This is not giving me a chance to see if these are heating properly. I would just like to get a replacement set and a box to return the one’s I received.
customer_reviews.author: suzie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my necessities. This set heats up quickly for me. I use it everyday to provide some shape and body to thin, fine hair, If it preheats too long one or two rollers may feel too hot so I use a q-tip as a spacer between the roller and the scalp. It packs easily for a trip but it's easy to forget the clips since they need to be added seoarately. It must be plugged in and unplugged to turn on and off; there is no switch.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Curls!
customer_reviews.text: After having very short hair for years, I decided to let mine grow out, a tedious fight that led me to start wearing bandanas and hats most of the time, because there was nothing for it but to cover my head. These work great, and I especially like the choice of clamps or wire thingies, which, in my memory were unreliable. I have some curls again where the hair is long enough, and can go out in public without hiding my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Esther E. Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great For My Hair Type!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why people keep giving this product such bad reviews. They worked perfectly fine to me. Before you purchase you should know you’re hair type first. These worked for me because my hair can retain curls very well. If you have fine hair I would recommend using a lot of product before hand. Like a texturizing spray or hair spray with a light/medium hold. Also my curls last a lot longer with day old unwashed hair. Loved this product so much due to the fact that I can do my makeup while the rollers in. Getting ready has never been this easy!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved that I could curl my hair while I was getting dressed. Very easy to use. Has 2 different styles on clips (the normal wire and a clip that I have not used) I don't always curl my hair but I prefer this over a curling iron.
customer_reviews.author: joyce e haspert

customer_reviews.title: Too hot - Burned my forehead and scalp
customer_reviews.text: The is the 3rd one I have owned and loved them. However, the heating element must have changed. My hairdresser found burns on my scalp and even shut it off for a few minutes before using. Sometimes when you pick up the roller, I have to drop it like a hot potato. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Deborah M. Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Broken butterfly clips.
customer_reviews.text: I got my Babyliss rollers. The rollers work fine. However they are supposed to come with 12 butterfly clips. If you have fine hair you have to use butterfly clips. Just be warned. The clips come on a cardboard board. 4 clips to a board. 4 of my clips were completely broken. I notified Amazon. No response yet. All I want is 4 more butterfly clips.
customer_reviews.author: Janell

customer_reviews.title: It's reputation, price, quality and speed does not hold up to the competition.
customer_reviews.text: I expected better quality and for it to heat up quicker. I still like my Remington TStudio better and they were less expensive. Only thing better is this one has clips that doesn't leave ridges in my curls. I have to wait 20 minutes for them to set where my TStudio only takes 5.
customer_reviews.author: RKicF8

customer_reviews.title: My second set
customer_reviews.text: Had a set of these I bought about five years ago and they finally wore down, which is important...once they do, your hair starts to become damaged. I used to keep these in my hair about 1 1/2 hours but 30 - 45 minutes will actually give me what I need. I spitz on some leave-in treatment conditioner just to barely make it damp and viola! Bouncy full volume hair.
customer_reviews.author: gnaff9093

customer_reviews.title: Great set that heats up quickly/ no where to put larger hair clips
customer_reviews.text: I really like these curlers, there are many different sizes. They heat up quickly and don’t burn your fingers as you use them. (Important to me) I like the design, my one complaint is the pin holders do not work. Enclosed were the claw clips which work great, but no where to store them. Had to use one of my makeup bags to store them. Think they should have included one with the hair culler set since they are the only curl clips that work.
customer_reviews.author: beverly c.

customer_reviews.title: Mine came with a habit
customer_reviews.text: There was nothing unusual about the packaging (no dents, scrapes, damage). I read the instruction guide then safely assembled and plugged in the product. After about 1 1/2 minutes of being “on” I noticed smoke appear from the center of the unit. I could smell something burning. The smoke and smell weren’t like any of the ‘side effects’ from other heat styling tools I’ve used, so I turned off the power and unplugged it immediately. I wish I would have been able to use this product, but did not want to risk starting a fire. Perhaps mine was defective.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with these rollers
customer_reviews.text: Very Happy with the BaBylissPro Nano Titanium Professional rollers, they come with clips and pins - (you don't need gloves to hold the rollers) I use the pin I have long thick hair, if you use a lot of hair the curls will be really soft (use hair spray first and less hair for a good hold) I have tried many brands and have to return them as they will not work with my hair.
customer_reviews.author: IM Pops

customer_reviews.title: Body with no fuss
customer_reviews.text: I have medium length hair; these hot rollers are excellent. I don't blow dry my hair well so I dry it with the hairdryer, while these rollers are heating up. I put the rollers in my hair, then do my makeup. If I'm in a rush I take them out after my makeup is done; if I want a longer lasting curl I leave them in longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These rollers work fast and efficiently
customer_reviews.text: Love these hot rollers! They heat up quickly and curl my medium length hair after only being left in for 5 minutes. The curl holds better than any set I've ever used. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: L.D.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t hold a curl
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to try these hot rollers but after two attempts, my hair just went flat. They heated up fine and were easy to put in but my hair just didn’t hold the curl. This picture was taken after leaving them in for an hour! It could just be my hair type... but the rollers are good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Not only were they the perfect size (so I wasn't paying money for sizes that ...
customer_reviews.text: I tend to shy away from electric curlers because of past experience of frizzy hair, however, after reading the reviews on this set, I thought I would give them a try. Not only were they the perfect size (so I wasn't paying money for sizes that I wouldn't be using) but there were just five of them which was all that I needed. To say that I am very pleased would understate the fact of how satisfied I am with this product. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ladyfair524

customer_reviews.title: A Great Product
customer_reviews.text: It's a fabulous set of rollers. The only issue is I found it somewhere else for $20 less in price. I already threw out the box, otherwise I would have returned it. As for the rollers - they are excellent, so I will give it a 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size rollers
customer_reviews.text: These rollers are the perfect size. Comes with both the pins and the clips. Only takes 5 minutes to heat up, but gets very hot. I usually plug them in before my shower. While I blow dry my hair, I turn the set off so they can cool a bit. Gives my hair a professional blow-out look.
customer_reviews.author: amazonbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Best hot rollers I've ever had.
customer_reviews.text: Love the quickness of heating. My curls last all day. The velvet softness makes hair not tangle on the roller. It has metal pins and plastic clamps to hold in place. I love that I mostly use the metal pins but sometimes it doesn't hold and I can clamp into spot with the plastic clamps.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: These are the first set of rollers I have ever owned. Great first choice! I like the clothe material that is on each roller as this will protect and hold hair. Also like how the rollers heat quickly (5 mins or less) and stay heated while still in the container. Can't help but smile at each curl that is unrolled form a roller. Have Fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Size
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something to help my hair hold curl during the Pandemic since I can’t get a perm at the stylist. My curling iron was not adding what I needed. HOWEVER, I did not understand that all rollers were extra large. Therefore, I must also finish up with the curling iron to catch parts of my hair for which the rollers were too big. I think it would have worked had I received a set with multiple size rollers. So be careful when ordering and double check the roller size.
customer_reviews.author: Dede

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressive hot rollers
customer_reviews.text: I bought these hot rollers because the I did not like last brand of hot rollers I bought that also had rave reviews. This brand is better in the sense that the rollers do not get too hot to handle comfortably when heated, but I did not find the curls lasted well for my very fine, straight hair.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Sousan

customer_reviews.title: Great little travel buddy
customer_reviews.text: This is great for travel and fits snug in my suitcase. This doesn't heat up to scorching hot but a more then warm. If I need a tighter curl, I use Kendra Thermal Styling Spray. If I want more body, then I just use a root lifter ( right now I'm trying out Pureology ) and Kendi Oil from the Bamboo line on the ends. I have long straight hair and use the regular hot rollers to hold all my hair but needed something for travel and as we all know, a full set of hot rollers is way too bulky and take up too much room in a suitcase. This is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Shoozy

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT RECOMMEND. Sent back immediately.
customer_reviews.text: Sent back- was really not a quality set. I have curly hair and wanted waves sometimes so I thought this would work. It did not. It made my hair straighter somehow. Bad quality, rollers never got very hot at all. DO NOT RECOMMEND. I sent this back immediately and I’m a huge Amazon shopper and have only sent one other item back before
customer_reviews.author: C. Miles

customer_reviews.title: TURN ON SWITCH BROKEN. DEFECTIVE DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this item for just over a year. The on/off switch got stuck and moved back into the unit. It is broken and APPARENTLY I CANNOT RETURN THIS ITEM. DO NOT BUY WITHOUT PROPER INFORMATION REGARDING RETURNS THAT ARE DEFECTIVE, EVEN AFTER A FEW MONTHS !
customer_reviews.author: book listener

customer_reviews.title: Good easy to use nice size
customer_reviews.text: Love them!! The base fell, I was afraid I’d have to replace the new rollers. However this heater keeps on truckin’! I love them
customer_reviews.author: d

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel rollers!
customer_reviews.text: Great rollers for travel. Love the roller size. These are wonderful to curl your hair and smooth out your style. Put them in, finish your makeup and good to go. Leaves bounce and body in your hair for days.
customer_reviews.author: JjNuge

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful effortless curls
customer_reviews.text: I have never used hot rollers before. But now that I have I will never use a curling iron or flat iron again lol. I love how natural the curls look, it look so effortless and makes my hair so volumous. I love these so much! It is a little pricey but I’m sure these will last me forever!
customer_reviews.author: Maninime

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected...
customer_reviews.text: I kind of expected these to be completely different. They arent nearly the heat I thought, the curls are not tight even on the smallest rollers and the fabric on them makes them get stuck in my hair and hard to pull out. I went back to a 1" barrel curling iron and sadly these are in the closet :( disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: RachelTowns

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth it for many reasons!
customer_reviews.text: Love the design and how i can leave it t on the counter and it looks good! Love everything about these! I love the soft curls that it makes every single time!
customer_reviews.author: Kris H.

customer_reviews.title: Best hot rollers
customer_reviews.text: I decided to get some new hot rollers after my others quit on me, I did my research and it led me to these hot rollers. I love them and they heat up fast and give me a great curl every time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: I reforge product! They never got hot. My 15 year old conair rollers work better than these! Don’t buy! My hair always holds a curl and it didn’t hold with these rollers
customer_reviews.author: jamie jackson

customer_reviews.title: Love , love , love
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these exact hit rollers your many many years, can no longer purchase at a beauty supply store they just do not carry them decided to check Amazon and they were there I was happy !! The only hot rollers with 12 of the same size, I love them! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Cyr

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time long haired friends
customer_reviews.text: These look great, feel great and are packaged great. However, they do not produce great results. I have thick medium length hair and I literally had no curl after these were in my hair for 20 minutes. Exceptionally disappointing to say the least. Sending back.
customer_reviews.author: Traci P.

customer_reviews.title: Babyliss Hot Curlers
customer_reviews.text: I do not like this product. The curlers get extremely hot and burn my scalp and around my hairline, forehead, sides of face and neck. They get hot quickly and I have to turn them off before I finish rolling my hair. The picks they provide are not helpful. I could never recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting curl
customer_reviews.text: Love the size of these rollers since they are all the same there is no wasted rollers that might be to small or to big. They heat up quickly and are easy to roll your hair up. There is no tangling since the foam on the roller is soft and pliable. Great hard shell case.
customer_reviews.author: pie maker

customer_reviews.title: Love love love these
customer_reviews.text: I bought other brand of curlers before these and just hated them. The clips popped off while I was trying to put more curlers in. It was very frustrating. I knew that I would never curl my hair if I had to deal with that, so I bought this set and just love them. Easy to work with, lots of curlers in various sizes - yeah I paid more for it but it is worth it cuz I can do various styles.
customer_reviews.author: JoyfulAbundance

customer_reviews.title: You got to get you some of these
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy with this product that I purchased three. I have left them in the homes of family members where I travel most often. These rollers do not take up very much space, and they work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Quapaw Woman

customer_reviews.title: ROLLERS MELTED!
customer_reviews.text: The first two times I used the set, I noticed uneven heating—a couple of rollers too hot, but then three not hot enough. The third time I used them, two rollers melted. Yes! As I took the rollers out of the case to roll my hair, the plastic ends of the rollers were stringing melted white plastic on my bathroom vanity. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT! Scary and dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: ParisTraveler

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Curl
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set to replace an older set. BabyBliss heats up fast & I did my makeup while curl was setting. I used the clips that came with the set to hold the curlers. I had a very nice loose beach wave curl. My hair is about 3” past shoulders. I highly recommend this hot roller set.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Great hot rollers
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used hot rollers in years but these were so highly recommended, I had to try them. They are fantastic! Heat up quickly, don’t get tangled in my hair, and work beautifully with my fine hair. Great product for a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Marti Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love. Love. Love. Just what I was looking for. Heats up nicely, curls and makes nice wavy layers. The metal clips work best for me - but appreciate that the item came with both so I had a choice.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Pavlovich

customer_reviews.title: melted
customer_reviews.text: On a normal day use; curlers melted and worthless, very upsetting, tossed it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Have learned to appreciate
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I didn't like it a lot until I started using a special spray for conditioning dry hair before hot roller use (there are lots of brands out there; they help to set the curl & lessen damage to hair) because my hair didn't stay in the roller. These are "flocked" which, at first, I didn't like. But, as I've practiced, I now like them. They're a good size roller. I try to be very careful as the edges can burn my skin. Just fyi, I have very fine hair that's just a couple of inches below my ears. I use rollers to give my hair body.
customer_reviews.author: TripleD

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE THEM!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these hot rollers, they make my hair look so shiny and healthy and the curls really hold well. I love the most that they come with the REAL hair pins which most hot rollers sets don't come with any more (I don't know why) they also come with those plastic clips which are garbage and I threw them away but I am so pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: vmiller

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Rollers heat up quickly and the velvet flocking makes them easier to stay in your hair without tangles. Put them in vertically to create beachy waves
customer_reviews.author: mrswhit

customer_reviews.title: Great curlers
customer_reviews.text: The clips really don’t hold my shoulder length hair. They tend to snap off, and then the curlers fall out. I’ve found that if I sit very still for 5 minutes, the curlers don’t fall out and I end up with lovely locks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: BaBylissPRO Nano Titanium Roller Hairsetter
product_meta.description:
Size:20 RollersThis professional set includes 20 velvety flocked rollers: 6 small (3/4"), 6 medium (1"), & 8 large (1-1/4"), 12 butterfly clips & 12 color-coded metal clips. Nano titanium ceramic cores heat these rollers up quickly & evenly for smooth waves & curls. Use these salon-quality hot rollers to create smooth, shiny natural bouncy curls or waves without damaging hair.

BRAND STORY
BaBylissPRO is the world’s leading producer of innovative, high-performance professional styling tools. Chosen by hairdressers, barbers, and clients everywhere, BabylissPRO styling tools are versatile and engineered to last.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
